universum.studios.android.intent

Class EmailIntent

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.intent.BaseIntent<EmailIntent>
      • universum.studios.android.intent.EmailIntent

  • public class EmailIntent
extends BaseIntent<EmailIntent>
    A BaseIntent builder implementation providing API for building and starting of intents targeting a e-mail related applications.

    Primary e-mail addresses may be specified via to(String) or to(String...). Carbon copy addresses may be specified via cc(String) or cc(String...). If blind carbon copy addresses are also desired, these may be specified via bcc(String) or bcc(String...).

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Detail

      • to

        public EmailIntent to(@NonNull
                      String address)
        Appends the given address to the current primary e-mail addresses to which to send an e-mail.

        Note, that only valid e-mail address will be added.

        Parameters:
        address - The desired e-mail address to add.
        Returns:
        This intent builder to allow methods chaining.
        See Also:
        to(String...), addresses()

      • to

        public EmailIntent to(@NonNull
                      String... addresses)
        Same as to(List) for variable array of addresses.
        Parameters:
        addresses - The desired array of e-mail addresses to add.

      • to

        public EmailIntent to(@Nullable
                      List<String> addresses)
        Appends the given set of addresses to the current primary e-mail addresses to which to send an e-mail.

        Note, that only valid e-mail addresses will be added.

        Parameters:
        addresses - The desired set of e-mail addresses to add. May be null to clear the current one.
        Returns:
        This intent builder to allow methods chaining.
        See Also:
        addresses()

      • addresses

        @NonNull
public List<String> addresses()
        Returns the list with valid primary e-mail addresses.
        Returns:
        List with e-mail addresses specified via one of to(...) methods or Collections.EMPTY_LIST if there were no addresses specified yet.
        See Also:
        to(String), to(String...), to(List)

        public EmailIntent cc(@NonNull

        Note, that only valid e-mail address will be added.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        This intent builder to allow methods chaining.
        See Also:

      • ensureCanBuildOrThrow

        protected void ensureCanBuildOrThrow()
        Description copied from class: BaseIntent
        Called to ensure that this builder can build its Intent from its current data.

        If there are some required data missing/not specified, an exception indicating such state should be thrown. The default exception may be created via BaseIntent.cannotBuildIntentException(String).

        Overrides:
        ensureCanBuildOrThrow in class BaseIntent<EmailIntent>

      • onBuild

        @NonNull
protected Intent onBuild(@NonNull
                                   Context context)
        Description copied from class: BaseIntent
        Invoked from BaseIntent.build(Context) after BaseIntent.ensureCanBuildOrThrow() to build intent specific for this intent builder from the current data.
        Specified by:
        onBuild in class BaseIntent<EmailIntent>
        Parameters:
        context - Context obtained from the IntentStarter.
        Returns:
        Intent instance with current data.

      • createUri

        @Nullable
public static Uri createUri(@NonNull
                                       List<String> addresses)
        Creates an Uri specific for the Intent.ACTION_SENDTO intent action from the given set of e-mail addresses.
        Parameters:
        addresses - List with e-mail addresses.
        Returns:
        Created Uri containing the specified addresses or null if the given list of addresses is empty.

      • onStartWith

        protected boolean onStartWith(@NonNull
                              IntentStarter starter,
                              @NonNull
                              Intent intent)
        Description copied from class: BaseIntent
        Invoked whenever BaseIntent.startWith(IntentStarter) is called and there is an activity available that can handle the given intent that has been created via BaseIntent.build(Context).

        This implementation always returns true.

        Overrides:
        onStartWith in class BaseIntent<EmailIntent>
        Parameters:
        starter - The starter with which to start the intent.
        intent - The intent instance created by this intent builder.
        Returns:
        True to indicate that the intent has been started, false otherwise.
